name: 2D Robotron Clone
description:
This project is inspired by the classic Robotron 2084 arcade game. There are enemy waves and defeating them advances the player to the next wave. I am not sure if or when I will add more features to the game or add updates to change the feel of it but I uploaded it here to showcase my work so far on GameMaker Studio 2. I recently started learning this program in January 2021.

Controls:

Move - Left/Right/Up/Down Arrow Keys

Shoot Bullets - Left Click

Click Play Button - Left Click

If you win the entire game or you get a game over, press the space bar to go back to the start screen.
